name: Hidden Objects Food Truck - Junk Candy Object Time
name_original: Hidden Objects Food Truck - Junk Candy Object Time
description:
Hidden Objects – Food Truck & Junk Food is an artistically crafted Seek & Find game with 30+ levels! 100’s of Objects to Find!

Explore Food Trucks around the world in New York, Los Angeles, Chicago, Dallas, Hawaii, New Jersey, Florida, England, Germany & more searching for Hidden Objects!

Junk Food galore with Donuts, Cupcakes, Pizza, Milkshakes, Hamburgers, French Fries, Tacos, Cake Pops, Candy, Chocolate, Chips, Funnel Cakes, Candy Apples, more!

Discover the Hottest Food Trend! Mouth-Watering App!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Seek & Find, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure is sure to entertain!

Hidden Objects – Food Truck & Junk Food features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics of Food Trucks & Food Carts
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints

Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
